moves.name: Measured Strike
moves.description: Deal physical damage with disciplined form.

moves.name: Guard Stance
moves.description: Increase Armor and reduce incoming damage for 1 turn. Gain Resolve.

moves.name: Vein Vision
moves.description: Reveal enemy weak points: gain Accuracy and Crit against the target for 2 turns.

moves.name: Bonebreaker
moves.description: Heavy strike that deals high damage and lowers target Armor for 2 turns.

moves.name: Disarming Blow
moves.description: Deal moderate damage and reduce target Attack for 2 turns.

moves.name: Intercept
moves.description: Protect an ally: redirect the next hit to Bellinor and gain temporary Armor for 1 turn. Gain Resolve.

moves.name: Rapid Mend
moves.description: Heal self or an ally. Stronger if used on a target below half HP. Gain Resolve.

moves.name: Command: Halt
moves.description: Charm magic (combat-limited): force a target to lose their next action (Stand Down). Breaks if the target takes damage before their turn.

moves.name: Command: Drop Weapon
moves.description: Charm magic (combat-limited): reduce target Attack heavily for 1 turn (as if they dropped their weapon). Breaks if target is hit by Bellinor this turn.

moves.name: Command: Protect
moves.description: Charm magic (combat-limited): force a target to Guard an ally of Bellinor's choice for 1 turn (they will intercept one hit).

moves.name: Battle Hymn
moves.description: Sing to steady the field: allies gain Resolve Shield, enemies suffer Accuracy down for 2 turns.

moves.name: Unbroken
moves.description: Remove all debuffs from self, gain Armor and Attack for 2 turns.

moves.name: Judgment Strike
moves.description: Deal massive damage. If the target is below 30% HP, this attack deals bonus damage.

moves.name: Oathbound Chorus
moves.description: Ultimate: Sing a binding command that stabilizes allies and suppresses enemies. Allies heal and gain Armor; enemies are Silenced (cannot use skills) for 1 turn.
